item.title: Alda for Music Creation
item.description:
This guide is a re-organization for Alda Official. If something is missing please go to the website for more details.

# WHY: Why

  • Alda is a very simple tool for music creation, which fullfill my all requirements for music creation.
  • Alda is a text-base tools which means I could fully editing in the terminal.
  • Alda is totally open-source

# WHAT: What

Alda is a text-based programming language for music composition. It allows you to write and play back music using only a text editor and the command line.

# HOW: How
